00080 inline SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockType SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getNextType()
00081 {
00082         if (end > length)
00083                 throw new SBWTypeMismatchException("reached end of data");
00084 
00085         int x = (char)data[end];
00086         return (SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockType)x ;
00087 }
00088 
00094 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::extract(unsigned char *x, SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer l)
00095 {
00096         if (end + l > length)
00097                 throw new SBWTypeMismatchException("reached end of data");
00098 
00099         memcpy(x, data + end, l);
00100         end += l ;
00101 }
00102 
00109 inline unsigned char *SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getRemainingDataForC(
00110         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer &lengthReturned)
00111 {
00112         lengthReturned = length - end ;
00113         unsigned char *result = (unsigned char *)malloc(lengthReturned);
00114 
00115         extract(result, lengthReturned);
00116 
00117         return result ;
00118 }

00208 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getWithoutType(unsigned char & x)
00209 {
00210         extract(&x, 1);
00211 }

00218 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getWithoutType(SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer& x)

00248 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getWithoutType(std::string &x)
00249 {
00250         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer l ;
00251 
00252         getWithoutType(l);
00253         
00254         std::string result((char *)data + end, l);
00255 
00256         x = result ;
00257         end += l ;
00258 }
00259 
00266 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getWithoutType(char *&s)
00267 {
00268         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer l ;
00269 
00270         getWithoutType(l);
00271         
00272         s = new char[l + 1];
00273         extract((unsigned char *)s, l);
00274         s[l] = '\0';
00275 }

00283 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getWithoutTypeForC(char *&s)
00284 {
00285         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer l ;
00286 
00287         getWithoutType(l);
00288         
00289         s = (char *)malloc(l + 1);
00290         extract((unsigned char *)s, l);
00291         s[l] = '\0';
00292 }
00293 
00299 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::getWithoutType(sbwDataBlockReader *&x)
00300 {
00301         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer items ;
00302 
00303         getWithoutType(items);
00304 
00305         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::Integer start = end ;
00306 
00307         while (items != 0)
00308         {
00309                 skipObject();
00310                 items-- ;
00311         }
00312 
00313         // trick put temporary terminator into sequence for new DataBlockReader to copy
00314         unsigned char temp = data[end] ;
00315         data[end] = (unsigned char) TerminateType ;
00316 
00317         x = new sbwDataBlockReader(data + start, end - start + 1);
00318 
00319         data[end] = temp ;
00320 }

00323 // Construction/Destruction

00327 inline SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::sbwDataBlockReader() : data(NULL), end(0), length(0)
00328 {
00329 }
00330 
00332 inline void SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader::skipObject()
00333 {
00334         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::DataBlockType type = getNextType();
00335 
00336         end++;
00337         skipObjectWithoutType(type);
00338 }
